Class nvmlPciInfo_t

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.bytedeco.javacpp.Pointer

  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    AutoCloseable

    @Properties(inherit=nvml.class)
public class nvmlPciInfo_t
extends Pointer
    PCI information about a GPU device.
